page.title: 08HADNOCK FARM _ 1
page.content: {Hadnock Farm}(530147) near the{River {Wye}comprises: 350 acres of farmland 17 acres of rented land 150 acres of woodland Most of the land is{graded 3 or 4.} There is also 1 mile of salmon fishing. As well as the main farmhouse there are 2 cottages, another small house and a holiday cottage. The work is carried out by the owner{Major Waller,}his son and 2 farm labourers (1 is part-time).{5,800 man {hours}are needed to run the farm efficiently. Most fields are about 20 acres and there are about{200 acres of cereals (oats,barley,wheat) and{150 acres of {grass.}The livestock comprise about{ {300 ewes and 25-30 Charalet beef {cattle.}At peak times these double.
